Text: Thanks!!! Can't wait to see the movie either.

Hey guys, the movie is even worth to see in cinemas. I really recommend it before watching it on your comp.,

Don't bother with this download.  The album, artist, and track info are not properly included and are all stuffed into the titles, each track cuts off about ten seconds early.

yy, true. Most of them cut about 5 sec. before it should end. Sorry but that's all what i got. Beside this, the quality is really high and it's ok to use them in your own movie, when you don't need it in full,
cheers and sorry 1 more time.
